panels.description: Number of network peers the node is connected to
panels.title: Peer Count

panels.description: Network timeout is dynamic parameter indicating how long will node wait for response, latency is the actual time to response.
panels.title: Network Timing

panels.description: From all chains
panels.title: Messages Received per Second

panels.description: From all chains
panels.title: Messages Sent per Second

panels.description: From all chains
panels.title: Messages Failed To Send per Second

panels.description: Number of outstanding requests related to consensus/bootstrapping. Doesn't include handshake messages.
panels.title: Outstanding Requests

panels.description: Number of messages waiting to acquire bytes from the inbound message throttler.
panels.title: Inbound Throttler Awaiting Acquire

panels.description: Amount of the stake in AVAX that is benched (ignored) because the nodes are unhealthy
panels.title: Benched stake

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the at-large byte allocation of the inbound message throttler
panels.title: Inbound Throttler Remaining At-Large Bytyes

panels.description: Number of messages that are currently being handled and haven't yet returned their bytes to the inbound message throttler.
panels.title: Inbound Throttler Awaiting Release (Messages Processing)

panels.description: The amount of time, on average, that we wait to acquire bytes from the throttler before reading a message.
panels.title: Inbound Message Throttler Acquire Latency

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the validator byte allocation of the inbound message throttler
panels.title: Inbound Throttler Remaining Validator Bytyes

panels.description: Number of inbound messages dropped (not processed) due to expiration in last minute.
panels.title: Inbound Messages Dropped in Last Minute

panels.description: Number of messages that could not be parsed because they were of unknown type or invalidly formatted.
panels.title: Messages Failed To Parse per Minute

panels.description: Number of messages that are queued to be sent to peers
panels.title: Messages Awaiting Send

panels.description: Number of outbound messages dropped (not sent) due to rate-limiting in the last minute
panels.title: Outbound Messages Dropped in Last Minute

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the at-large byte allocation of the outbound message throttler
panels.title: Outbound Throttler Remaining At-Large Bytyes

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the validator byte allocation of the outbound message throttler
panels.title: Outbound Throttler Remaining Validator Bytyes

panels.description: Number of inbound connections dropped due to inbound connection rate-limiting
panels.title: Inbound Connections Dropped due to Rate-Limiting per Minute

panels.description: Rate at which we save bytes (don't send/receive them over the network) by compressing messages/receiving compressed messages.
panels.title: Bytes Saved by Compression
Total Message Compression Time per Second

panels.description: Considers all outbound traffic, including non-consensus messages
panels.title: Bytes Sent per Accepted Container
